main event: On April 17, 1967, a report was filed concerning the sighting of two unidentified flying objects near Salem, Virginia.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 14 to 17 seconds., The observer claimed to have witnessed two objects but was contradicted by two other witnesses who denied seeing anything., The observer mentioned sending other photos of UFOs that were not related to this event., The objects were described as a hoax., The weather conditions were not specified during the sighting.
witness description: One observer with two witnesses disputing the sighting.
